TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ClientSettings extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains methods that make client-side providers available to the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterClientSideProviderAssembly(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName) cil managed

Docs.summary: Registers an assembly that contains client-side providers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called on startup by UI Automation clients that use client-side UI Automation providers loaded from an assembly. Applications that use providers implemented in their own assembly should call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ClientSettings.RegisterClientSideProviders%2A>.
## Examples For example code, see [Register a Client-Side Provider Assembly](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.exception: The assembly could not be loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterClientSideProviders(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ClientSideProviderDescription[] clientSideProviderDescription) cil managed

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called on startup by clients that implement their own client-side providers. Clients that use providers from a separate assembly must call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ClientSettings.RegisterClientSideProviderAssembly%2A>.
## Examples For example code, see [Implement UI Automation Providers in a Client Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.exception: The assembly could not be loaded.
